mockTaskData.title: Create a brochure for an online event
mockTaskData.details: There is a live online event to be hosted on the 1st of June, 2021. We need help creating a brochure that highlights our achievements. More details are available here: http://wit.org.in/

mockTaskData.title: Create an image for our social media
mockTaskData.details: We are launching a new social initiate to enable people to donate for the Covid patients in Dharavi, Mumbai. We need help creating a social media post for it. More details are available here: https://www.careindia.org/
